name: Vector Software
tag_list: unit-testing, code-coverage, embedded-testing, testing-safety-critical-software-applications, software-verification-validation, software-quality-assurance, dynamic-testing, dynamic-analysis, software-reliability, automated-unit-testing, unit-test-automati
overview:
Vector Software, Inc. is a provider of automated test tools for software developers. Established in 1989 as a consulting and service organization, Vector’s product focus is to empower software professionals to deliver the highest quality software in the least amount of time. Vector’s “VectorCAST” line of products reduces the burden placed on individual developers by automating and standardizing application component level testing. The tools support C/C++, Embedded C++ (EC++), and Ada83/95.

Vector’s market focus is on companies performing embedded systems development for aerospace, military, medical, railway, and industrial control related projects.

Vector Software is privately held and is headquartered in East Greenwich, Rhode Island.
